colti:
Technical operations projects series ; no.
            TO 664

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would help finance:
            (a) the construction and paving of three highways totalling
            165 km; (b) the paving of four highways totalling 264 km;
            and (c) the detailed engineering and supervision of the
            proposed works.
